query:
SELECT wl.id, wl.status, wl.training_date, wle.exercise_name, wle.muscle_group, wle.completed_sets, wle.total_volume, wle.total_reps
FROM workout_logs wl
LEFT JOIN workout_log_exercises wle ON wle.workout_log_id = wl.id
WHERE wl.student_id = 1 AND wl.status = 'in_progress'
ORDER BY wl.training_date DESC
LIMIT 20;
